Package game.world

Class InitialiseGameMap

java.lang.Object
game.world.InitialiseGameMap
public class InitialiseGameMap extends Object
The InitialiseGameMap class is responsible for initializing and managing game maps in the text-based game. It provides methods to add bosses and gates to the map, as well as resetting the map when required. This class is part of the game.world package and is designed for use within the game engine.

    reset(GameMap oldMap)
